## TxBuilder.setMinimumFee() method

Sets the minimum fee for the transaction. This fee will be used during the transaction building process.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setMinimumFee(fee: bigint): TxBuilder;
```

</th><th>

fee

</td><td>

The minimum fee to be set.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

[TxBuilder](./tx.txbuilder.md)
